siteInfo.title: fire's World - ADEL ELORABY| Full-Stack Developer
siteInfo.tagline: You may not always see Fire... but it's the one you fear most.

profile.name: ADEL EL ORABY
bio: Hello World! My name is ADEL ELORABY,I started my coding journey at the age of 12, initially learning game development with Unity Engine. Since then, I've evolved into a full-stack developer with a passion for backend systems.

I'm mostly self-taught, with additional training from Digital Cubs of Egypt Initiative, ITI (Information Technology Institute), and NTI (National Telecommunication Institute). I love logical thinking and calculations, which is why I prefer backend development over frontend.
When I'm not coding, I enjoy playing chess, reading Arabic and translated novels, and working on my language skills. My English is good, and I aspire to master German alongside my native Arabic.

projects.name: Kill Enemy FPS
projects.description: An immersive FPS game developed using Unity Engine with advanced enemy AI, weapon systems, and dynamic environments.

projects.name: Shoot Gun
projects.description: Action-packed shooting game with realistic physics, multiple weapon types, and challenging gameplay mechanics.

projects.name: Ettasel Nasel

projects.name: Appie Work Shop
projects.description: Responsive web application designed for workshop management with modern UI/UX and smooth animations.

projects.name: Center Al-Resala
projects.description: Comprehensive web platform for educational center management built with Flask and modern backend architecture.

projects.name: Thunder Portfolio
projects.description: This very website! A futuristic portfolio built with modern web technologies and smooth animations.

projects.name: Control Team 1
projects.description: A web application for team management, developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript forms.

projects.name: Control Team 2
projects.description: A second iteration of the team management web application, with enhanced features and improved UI/UX.

projects.name: Atbara Universities Forum
projects.description: A simple web application developed using Flask, allowing users to register for the forum by filling out a form that collects personal information and required documents. Designed with a clean and user-friendly interface.

projects.name: Chatr ‚Äì Real-Time Chat Application
projects.description: A responsive real-time chat app built with PHP (backend) and HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (frontend). It supports instant messaging across multiple chat rooms, online user lists, emoji support, and notifications. Designed for smooth, dynamic communication with an intuitive interface that works seamlessly on both desktop and mobile devices.

projects.name: Confidential Client Project
projects.description: A private project developed for a client, showcasing advanced features and robust architecture. Images are available for viewing.

projects.name: El-Magicano System - School Management
projects.description: A sophisticated, full-stack web application designed for comprehensive school management, featuring a modern Arabic-friendly interface with neon aesthetics. Built with Flask, SQLAlchemy, and modern frontend technologies.

projects.name: Molouk-Alta7leel
projects.description: A comprehensive Arabic learning platform featuring secure video lessons, exam system with results tracking, progress monitoring, and advanced admin tools. Built with secure video player technology to protect content while maintaining accessibility.

items.name: Mr. Gamal Essa
items.text:
‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê Excellent platform ‚Äî highly recommended!

Thank you for building this platform. It has made a real difference for my child's Arabic studies.

The video lessons are clear and well-organized, and the secure access system gives me confidence. The interface is clean and easy to use, and the progress tracking helps us see improvement.

The exam system and results tracking are valuable, and the admin tools show attention to detail. The secure video player ensures content is protected while remaining accessible.

This platform has become essential for our Arabic learning. Thank you for creating such a valuable resource.

‚Äî A grateful parent

items.name: El-Shikh Mohamed
items.text: Thunder delivered an exceptional web application for our business. His backend skills are truly impressive for someone his age. The project was completed on time and exceeded our expectations. Highly recommended!

items.name: Ahmed Abo Gabal
items.text: Working with Ahmed was a pleasure. He's not only technically skilled but also great at communication. His Flask-based solution solved all our database challenges. Will definitely work with him again!

services.title: Backend Development

services.description: RESTful APIs, third-party integrations, and microservices architecture for scalable web applications.

footer.tagline: Stay loud, even in silence ‚Äî that's the Thunder way.
